value.title: Refresh Power BI Queries Through Power Platform Dataflows   Unlimited Times with Any Frequency
value.excerpt: If you don't have a Power BI Premium capacity license, then you are limited to refresh your dataflows up to eight times a day, with the frequency of 30 minutes.
